text: haey chaur puok anak chayvay( tropy sa mb tde) knong meakra robsa a l laoh haey kom bandaoy aoy khluon robsa puok anak thleaktowknong pheap vineasa a nd reay( daoy min chamnay knong meakra robsa a l laoh) . haey chaur puok anak thveula choh pitabrakd nasa a l laoh sraleanh banda anak del thveula
